project_ujji

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • project_ujji.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    OVERVIEW: This class represents the manager's login page and main login page for our application MUTABLE: This class is mutable since you can change the states and fields after the object is created REP INVARIANT: RI(c) = true if c.userid !=null, c.passord !=null false otherwise ABSTRACTION FUNCTION: AF(c) = a mainController mainCont c.id = mainCont.userid, c.pass = mainCont.password .
